function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Retesting for confirmation of results","Impact":"Misinterpretation of test results, leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Standardize and validate retesting procedures to ensure accuracy and consistency","Technologies":"Standardized testing protocols, automation of testing processes","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research team"},{"Description":"Inaccurate identification of SARS-CoV-2 genome sequences","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the virus type, leading to misalignment of further research","Mitigation":"Verification of sequence identity using reliable sequencing and comparison methods","Technologies":"Sequencing technologies, sequence alignment tools","People":"Research team, bioinformaticians","Owner":"Principal investigator, sequencing facility"},{"Description":"Low sensitivity of real-time RT-qPCR assay","Impact":"Failure to detect SARS-CoV-2 RNA in samples, leading to inaccurate quantitative data","Mitigation":"Validation of assay sensitivity and comparison with other established assays","Technologies":"Real-time RT-qPCR optimization, comparative studies on assay sensitivity","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research team"}]}
